mdRecord.dcterms:title: Northumberland Academy, near Heathsville, Va: The trustees of Northumberland Academy respectfully announce to the community, that they have fortunately secured the services, as president for the ensuing year, of Rev. R.H. Ball
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Northumberland Academy. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: J.S. Smith, president Board of trustees. [original]
Trustees: T.S. Sydnor, esq., R.A. Claybrook, esq., Edwin Nelms, esq., S.A.M. Leland, esq., Walter Rice, esq., Joseph Basye, M.D. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Ball, Richard Henry, 1935-
Northumberland Academy.
